channel.title: Home on Wintervale, ME
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Wintervale, ME

item.title: The Last Straw, with Discord.
item.description: The restraint I’m going to have writing this post is going to kill me.

item.title: Discord and Incompatibility.
item.description: Half of this is my fault. Half of this is Discord’s fault. Half of this other people’s fault. Which one doesn’t fit in the 100%? I wish I knew.

item.title: Hello again, internet.
item.description: Oh great, it’s time for Ren’s yearly blog post to annoy the hell out of everyone, eh?

item.title: New Topics: Shut Up and Listen
item.description: Or: How you need to learn to stop talking and try new things. No, seriously. You think you are open minded? How much?

item.title: A reflection on "TERF".
item.description: The more I’ve been pushing myself to be more independent, and to just grow in a positive direction, the more I realize that so many people just aren’t worth listening to.

item.title: Discord and Communication.
item.description: I’m going to preface this by saying this happens to every company. Discord isn’t an exception, it just so happens to be the next in line, much to my dismay.

item.title: Discord and File Hosting.
item.description:
It turns out a lot of people use Discord as a file host. Probably because:

  • It’s quick
  • It’s easy
  • It’s free*

item.title: Discord.
item.description: I’ve been on Discord for a long time. Since 2016, even.

item.title: A terrible absence.
item.description: I haven’t posted anything in a while. Again.

item.title: Obligatory diary.
item.description: I haven’t posted anything in a while.

item.title: Hello, Navi.
item.description: This was going to be a placeholder with nothing but a Serial Experiments Lain reference, but that’d be ridiculous.

item.title: A few notes.
item.description:
Hello. If you’re seeing this, you’re likely here from my Discord profile or somewhere else. This post’s here to make a few things clear about myself.

  • I am “Vee”, or “veselle”.
  • I use she/her pronouns.
  • I am very noise sensitive.
  • I do not like social media.
  • I prefer to be left alone.
  • I may come off as cold at times.
  • I only want to be messaged or pinged for important things.
  • I have a very low social battery. I may not respond immediately.
  • I do not wish to be “depended on”, “checked up on”, or anything similar.

If I don’t know you that well, I won’t be accepting a friend request.

item.title: How is this?
item.description:
I use the following to make this site work:

  • Hugo
  • alaGeek
  • GitHub Pages
  • Alcohol
  • Magic

item.title: What is this?
item.description:
This site is my personal interet web page, graciously hosted by the Community of Wintervale and constructed with the help of Hugo. If you live in the internet, please come and say hi, I welcome visitors at all times.

For any prospective reading this that are confused on what the hell I just said, don’t worry about it, it doesn’t apply to you.

Don’t think too much about it. You probably won’t be visiting Wintervale anyway.

item.title: When is this?
item.description:
If my timekeeping is correct, it should be sometime after 0004, or 2024.

What, you’re asking me when I get things done? Whenever. That’s my policy.

item.title: Where is this?
item.description:
I host this site on GitHub Pages, since hosting it on my local internet connection is a pain.

If you’re asking where I live, you can find me at the Wintervale Manor. If you’re asking for physical location, go away. I don’t take kindly to creeps. Unless you show up with alcohol, in which case, do email me. (Don’t.)

For my socials, please check the socials page.

item.title: Who is this?
item.description:
I am Vee. I also go by veselle as an online name. I predominantly write and worldbuild, but I sometimes do other things, depending on what I feel suits me best for the time.

Outside of writing, I study Japanese. I wish to be a translator at some point in my life. An eventuality.

I am a lover of:

  • Retro consoles.
  • Y2K/Metalheart aesthetic.
  • Shitposting.

My real name will never be posted on this site. I’m sure you could figure it out if you really wanted to, though.

item.title: Why is this?
item.description:
Why do I have my own personal site? I want to. This is my own little corner of the internet, and if anything, I’m glad you just stopped to say hi.

If you’re wondering why my website is structured like this, I just like it.

If you wish to follow my efforts, please take a look at where I am.
